external_games.name: Discovery Tour by Assassin’s Creed: Ancient Egypt

name: Discovery Tour: Ancient Egypt
storyline: The Discovery Tour allows you to roam freely in the beautiful world of Ptolemaic Egypt. Learn more about its life, habits and customs by yourself, or let historians and Egyptologists guide you on one of the 75 available historical tours they have curated.
summary:
Discovery Tour: Ancient Egypt is an educational mode of the game Assassin's Creed Origins in which you can discover and explore the world free of conflict, or gameplay constraints.

The Discovery Tour allows you to roam freely in the beautiful world of Ptolemaic Egypt. Learn more about its life, habits and customs by yourself, or let historians and Egyptologists guide you on one of the 75 available historical tours they have curated.

It is available as a standalone or as part of Assassin's Creed: Origins.
